descriptions.location: The attic is cold and dark. Cobwebs hang from the aged wooden beams and a thick layer of dust covers everything. There is a pile of wooden boxes in one corner.

descriptions.detailed: A small door that was hidden behind the boxes.
The boxes contain various household items. Old clothes and blankets, crockery, and spare pots and pans. There is nothing of interest in the boxes, but there seems to be something behind them.
descriptions.tooHeavy: The boxes are too heavy to lift. You might be able to shove them out of the way though.
descriptions.push: It takes some time to manoeuvre the heavy boxes out of the way, but when you have done so, you stand before the small door that was hidden behind them.
